Three injured as serious crash shuts State Highway 2 north of Gisborne https://www.nzherald.co.nz https://www.nzherald.co.nz Three people have been taken to Gisborne Hospital with serious to critical injuries. Wed, 04 Sep 2024 09:02:02 +0000 Three people in a car that came off State Highway 2 north of Gisborne were taken by helicopter to Gisborne Hospital with serious to critical injuries.
